MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode areas of Kincardine and Alloa. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am due to emergency tree cutting in the Whistleberry area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:33am on Friday, 16 April 2021
